name: Apple
desc: Juicy red apple used for cooking, eating raw or cider production

name: Cabbage
desc: thick green or purple leaves surrounding a spherical heart or head of young leaves

name: Eggplant
desc: Eggplants are similar to summer squash or zucchini: tender, mild, and sweet with a slight vegetal bitterness

name: Fennel
desc: Fennel has a mild licorice flavor and can be thinly sliced and eaten raw or cooked

name: Chicken
desc: Chicken is the most common poultry in the world. used in variety of cuisine

name: Beef
desc: Beef contains protein, iron, and vitamin B12. Beef is used in steak

name: Salmon
desc: Wild Atlantic Salmon. Maybe used in variety of seafood dishes and logos

name: Icecream
desc: Sweetened frozen food comes in a variety of flavours
